actions.text: Amendment SA 3402 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3402 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S6785-6789) To express the sense of Congress that the elimination of the drug trade in Afghanistan should be a national security priority for the United States, and to require a report on related efforts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3402 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3402 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Grassley.

purpose: To express the sense of Congress that the elimination of the drug trade in Afghanistan should be a national security priority for the United States, and to require a report on related efforts.
